item.title: Product Overview
item.description: Product Overview # Storj DCS # For developers who demand ownership of their data and who want to build with confidence, Storj Decentralized Cloud Storage (DCS) is private by design and secure by defaultâ€”delivering unparalleled data protection and privacy when compared to traditional centralized cloud object storage alternatives. Storj DCS offers affordable and predictable pricing, S3 compatibility, a robust library of open source technical documentation and familiar development tools - along with a vibrant user community - which enables developers to economically and easily learn and leverage decentralized cloud storage technology to take control of their data when building the next great application or service.
